resources.string: View additional message detail - see settings
Put message text in larger top area of panel and sender in smaller lower area
Take advantage of multiple extension panels
YOU MUST ADD THE EXTRA PANELS IN DASHCLOCK OR ELSE MESSAGES WILL BE HIDDEN! Display each conversation in its own panel instead of collapsing to \'unread conversations.\' (to a max of 3 conversations)
Use Hangouts as default SMS app
This is only really needed for when the app leads to the whole messaging app instead of a specific thread.
Please install Hangouts or disable it in SMS Viewe\'s settings
